location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 20 of 1823 [sic] from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio that slightly obscures some of the body of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government, dated 3 April 1822 (No 433 of 1822), which instructed the Resident to forward a packet to HM charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia. It notes that as per Henry Willock's instructions, dated 3 April 1822, the Resident has retained the public letters at Bushire and forwarded the private correspondence to Tabreez [Tabriz].
